Name: team_size_within_limit
Description: Team size must not exceed the allowed maximum

Name: worker_availability_above_threshold
Description: Workers must meet minimum availability to be assigned

Name: sprint_status_is_planned_or_active
Description: Only planned or active sprints are eligible

Name: user_story_status_not_done
Description: Do not reconsider stories already done

Name: task_type_is_valid
Description: Tasks must be of allowed types (e.g.

Name: blocker_status_must_be_resolved
Description: Blockers linked to closed work must be resolved

Name: feature_priority_meets_minimum
Description: Features must meet a minimum priority to be selected

Name: project_budget_under_cap
Description: Project budget must not exceed the cap

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_defined
Description: Sprints must have a defined objective description

Name: review_feedback_documented
Description: Sprint reviews must include feedback documentation

Name: velocity_min_threshold
Description: Teams must meet a minimum velocity threshold
